transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Hi ma'am, very good evening. Kaisi hain aap?
Executive: Main theek hoon, aap kaise ho?
Executive: Bas bas badhiya ma'am. Thank you so much for asking. Actually Govind ji manager baat kar rahi thi. Aapka already discussion hua tha aapke catalog se related na Govind ke ma'am right?
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Hai na? Woh aapka kuch issue tha number vagera change karane ka. Toh woh already aap
Customer: Ji ji bataiye.
Executive: Ek account ka ho gaya hai. Ek account ka ho gaya. Unka phone aa gaya tha. But mere ko dusre account ka bhi karwana hai. Mujhe on priority karwana hai because mere ko
Executive: Dusre account mein bhi same issue hai kya?
Customer: Haan, mujhe uska number aur email change karwana hai.
Executive: Okay, koi baat nahi. Abhi filhaal is company ka ho gaya hai toh hum na yeh aapka yahan se na concern close kar rahe hain, theek hai? Kyunki na jaise aap matlab is cheez se related aapne complaint ki thi na toh woh ek concern banke open ho jaata hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh abhi main haan toh abhi main yeh close karungi na toh yahan pe jo aapka registered mail ID hoga, usse na ek service satisfaction satisfied ke liye na aapko ek mail aayega. Ki jisne bhi aapko services se related guide kiya hai usse aap satisfy hain ya nahi, right? Toh I hope humne aapka jo bhi problem tha woh resolve kar diya toh aapki taraf se positive hi feedback aayega, right?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul. Haanji.
Executive: Haan toh woh aap bas maine isi cheez ke liye call kiya tha ki wahan pe bas aap positive feedback provide kara dijiyega. Baki aap jab bhi mujhe dusri company ka dengi main woh change kara dungi. Aur aapko
Customer: Main aapko email karu?
Executive: Aur aap mujhe pehle toh woh company ka register number provide kara dijiyega. Kaunsi number kaunsa register number hai. Aur email ID aur number kaunsa wahan pe updated karana hai woh aap mujhe bhej dijiyega. Aap Govind ko bhi bhej dijiye.
Customer: Toh main email, email karu Govind ko fir se aapki agar aapko karna hai toh aap
Executive: Aap kuch bhi, aap kuch bhi kar sakti hain. Aap email bhi kar sakti hain, aap WhatsApp bhi kar sakti hain. Theek hai? Aapke paas hamara number aa gaya hoga. Govind ka number aa gaya hoga aapke paas. Unko aap directly unke number pe connect kijiyega. Aapko theek lage aap mail kar dijiyega. Main Govind ko apna mail ID provide kara dungi ki woh aapko share kar de. Aapko theek lage aap mail pe kar dijiyega. Aapko theek lage aap unko WhatsApp bhi kar sakti hain.
Customer: Main Govind ji ko WhatsApp kar deti hu. Mere paas documents hain sare ready jo chahiye hote hain. Aur mere paas number aur email bhi ready hai. Toh main toh abhi kar sakti hu WhatsApp.
Executive: Done done. Aap mujhe bhej dijiyega. Fir uska dekh ke hum uska bhi hum kara denge.
Customer: Aapka naam Shruti hai na? Toh fir main unko message kar deti hu ki meri Shruti ji se baat hui.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi. Sweety. S W double E T Y.
Customer: Haanji fir se?
Executive: S S W double E T Y Sweety.
Customer: S W double E T Y.
Executive: T Y double E T Y. Okay, Sweet.
Executive: Haan haan. Main un bol deti hu na Govind ko ek bar woh aapko message kar denge mera mera number aur mera name. Theek hai? Mera personal number woh aapko de denge.
Customer: Theek hai. Toh main aapko message kar deti hu aur unhe bhi bhej deti hu.
Executive: Ji ji done done. Main unko bolti hu ek bar aapko woh message drop kar denge. Okay, thank you so much ma'am. Thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change number and email of another account.

- Wants to know where to send details.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the concern for the first account.

- Executive asked to provide company registration number.

- Executive provided options to send details via email/WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details to Govind via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account update, email, whatsapp, registered number
